synopsis.text: To escape the burdensome expectations of his past life as a hero, Allen reincarnates into a world where divine gifts are bestowed upon the chosen few. However, his new life takes a turn for the worse when he is labeled a failure due to an apparent lack of divine power. Unbeknownst to his detractors, Allen retains the memories and abilities of his heroic past. Seizing the opportunity presented by his banishment from his noble family, Allen embarks on a journey to find the peaceful life he's always desired. But fate has other plans, as he stumbles upon an assassination attempt on his former fianc√©e. Reluctantly, the former hero is drawn into a new adventure, one he never asked for but cannot turn away from. With his powerful past and hope for a tranquil future, Allen's heroic saga unfolds in this captivating anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
